sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead } from 'mdbreact'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; import './StockTable.css'; import { format } from 'date-fns' const StockTable = (props) => { const {stock} = props; const commaFormat = new Intl.NumberFormat(); if (stock.Symbol) { const dlyChange = document.getElementById('dlyChange'); if (dlyChange) { if (stock.ChangePercent >= 0) { dlyChange.style.color = 'green'; } else if (stock.ChangePercent < 0) { dlyChange.style.color = 'red'; } } return
Analytic Value Company {stock.LongName} ({stock.Symbol}) Currency {stock.Currency} Beta {stock.Beta.toFixed(2)} Sector/Industry {stock.Sector}/{stock.Industry} Price ${stock.Price.toFixed(2)} Open Price ${stock.Open} ( {(stock.ChangePercent*100).toFixed(2)} {stock.ChangePercent ? '%' : ''} ) Previous Close ${stock.PreviousClose.toFixed(2)} Market Cap. ${commaFormat.format(stock.MarketCap)} Full-Time Employees {commaFormat.format(stock.FullTimeEmployees)} Shares Outstanding/Shorted {commaFormat.format(stock.SharesOutstanding)} Volume {commaFormat.format(stock.Volume)} P.E. Ratio {stock.PriceEarningsRatio.toFixed(2)}{stock.PriceEarningsRatio >= 0 ? 'x' : ''} BV Per Share ${commaFormat.format(stock.BookValuePerShare.toFixed(2))} EPS ${stock.EarningsPerShare.toFixed(2)} Operating Margin {(stock.OperatingMargin*100).toFixed(2)}% Profit Margin {(stock.ProfitMargin*100).toFixed(2)}% 12mo Trailing Dividend (Yield) {stock.TrailingAnnualDividend.toFixed} ( {(stock.TrailingAnnualDividendYield*100).toFixed(2)}%) Fwd Annual Dividend (Yield) {stock.ForwardAnnualDividend} ( {(stock.ForwardAnnualDividendYield*100).toFixed(2)}%) Dividend Payout Ratio {(stock.DividendPayoutRatio*100).toFixed(2)}% Net Cash ${commaFormat.format(stock.Cash - stock.Debt)} Cash ${commaFormat.format(stock.Cash)} Debt ${commaFormat.format(stock.Debt)} Debt to Equity Ratio {stock.DebtToEquityRatio.toFixed(2)} Current Ratio {(stock.CurrentRatio).toFixed(2)} ROA {(stock.ReturnOnAssets*100).toFixed(2)}% ROE {(stock.ReturnOnEquity*100).toFixed(2)}% Next Earnings Date {format(new Date(stock.EarningsDate), 'MM/dd/yyyy')} Last Fiscal Quarter Earnings {format(new Date(stock.LastFiscalQuarterEnd), 'MM/dd/yyyy')} Last Fiscal Year Earnings {format(new Date(stock.LastFiscalYearEnd), 'MM/dd/yyyy')}
} return null; } export default StockTable;
